name: Primal Impulses
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
• Exhaust Victor Creed → remove Primal Impulses from the game.
• Deal damage to another player equal to your ATK. If you cannot, place 3 threat on the main scheme instead. Discard this obligation.

name: "You've Taken Your Shot."
text: Victory 0. Assault. (Basic thwarts against this scheme use ATK instead of THW.) When Defeated: Attach the set-aside Now It's My Turn! upgrade to your identity. [hazard]

name: Now It's My Turn!
text: Linked (You've Taken Your Shot). Attach to your identity. You get -2 REC. Forced Response: After your turn ends, take 1 damage. Hero Action: Spend [physical][energy] resources → discard this card.

name: Wolverine
text: Quickstrike. Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase begins, heal 2 damage from Wolverine. (Sabertooth's nemesis minion.)

name: Adamantium Blades
text: Attach to the minion with the highest printed ATK. Otherwise, attach to the villain. [star] Attached enemy's attacks gain overkill and piercing. Hero Action: Spend [physical][energy] resources → discard this card.

name: Blood Feud
text: When Revealed: Shuffle this card into your deck. This card gains surge. Forced Response: After this card enters your hand, take 3 indirect damage. If you are in alter-ego form, you may discard a random card from your hand to prevent this damage.

name: Krakoan Justice
text: Attach to your identity. Attached identity cannot ready. When Revealed: You are stunned. If you are already stunned, this card gains surge. Hero Action: Spend [physical][mental] resources → discard this card. "You are exiled." —Professor X
